sentence: Location is wonderful and reading on the patio overlooking the creek was very relaxing
Loved the private balcony overlooking the creek
The view was beautiful and the inn was spotless
The room was spacious quiet and beds and pillows were so comfortable
The in room coffee was delicious and the rest of the amenities were also high in quality
Very fair price no charge for parking comfortable bed huge bathroom close to town next to park
Right next to a park closet to Santa Cruz mountains and easy access to downtown
Rooms are clean and excellent view of brook in the back from our room
Patio view of the creek
Out doors patio positioned on a beautiful Creek bed and breakfast was provided
Ok but should discount rooms during construction
Check in is on the 4th floor inside a suite
Love the view of the Creek however there was scaffolding blocking that during the renovation

The place was undergoing renovation so there was construction going on that was a little more extensive than we had anticipated but the staff were super accommodating and our accommodations clean with a lovely view of trees and a creek
There are few amenities at this property no terrace pool or for now meeting room
Lobby is in a conference room
Only downside aside from construction was shower pressure
The excercise room was not available and dust and construction on much of the premises
Well it is still going through a major remodel and you have to walk through unfinished areas to get to your room

Booked online called to confirm arrival time hours in advance called for 30 mins while driving to confirm the room was ready nobody answered after 5 call attempts arrived at check in the entire place was under renovations and wayfinding to the front desk was misleading
I had modified the booking and only had 3 rooms when I checked in
My stay was good untilI got home and saw I had been charged for two additional rooms that had not been in a previous booking by hotelscom

The hotel charged me rooms with a card not previously authorized and has now not responded to my emails to refund the chargesThis stay was for my wedding weekend and I am now sad because it was beautiful and I am unsure I will stay there again
